channel.title: Help in skillersscape
channel.description:
when i try o compile i get this [code]Found: Java JRE 1.6.0_02 Compiling Server, Please Wait... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i used my own compiler does any one know wats wrong
heres whats in notebook [code]@echo off cls title justins good compiler :main echo ------------------------------------------------------ echo Welcome to justins good Compiler V2.0 echo This Compiler is for Java 1.6.0_02 echo Select an option below to begin echo ------------------------------------------------------ echo c - Compile Server echo r - Runserver echo s - edit settins echo ------------------------------------------------------ set /p select= Selection: if %select%==c goto compile if %select%==r goto run if %select%==s goto settings if %select%==C goto compile if %select%==R goto run if %select$==S goto settings cls pause
:compile IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JRE1.6.0_02\BIN" (goto compile4)
:compile4 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JRE 1.6.0_02 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
:run cls title Runserver java -Xmx800M server cls pause
:settings cls echo Enter one of the following to change background colour... echo --- echo B0 - Black echo B1 - Blue echo B2 = Green echo B3 Cyan echo B4 = Red echo B5 = Purple echo B6 = Yellow echo B7 = White
echo Enter one of the following to change text colour... echo --- echo T0 = Black echo T1 = Blue echo T2 = Green echo T3 = Cyan echo T4 = Red echo T5 = Purple echo T6 = Yellow echo T7 = White
set /p s= selection:
if %s%== B0 (set b=0) if %s%== B1 (set b=1) if %s%== B2 (set b=2) if %s%== B3 (set b=3) if %s%== B4 (set b=4) if %s%== B5 (set b=5) if %s%== B6 (set b=6) if %s%== B7 (set b=F) if %s%== T0 (set t=0) if %s%== T1 (set t=1) if %s%== T2 (set t=2) if %s%== T3 (set t=3) if %s%== T4 (set t=4) if %s%== T5 (set t=5) if %s%== T6 (set t=6) if %s%== T7 (set t=F)
color %b%%t% pause cls goto main[/code]

item.title: Help in skillersscape
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

when i try o compile i get this

Found: Java JRE 1.6.0_02 Compiling Server, Please Wait... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Press any key to continue . . .
i used my own compiler does any one know wats wrong

heres whats in notebook

[code]@echo off
cls
title justins good compiler
:main
echo ------------------------------------------------------
echo Welcome to justins good Compiler V2.0
echo This Compiler is for Java 1.6.0_02
echo Select an option below to begin
echo ------------------------------------------------------
echo c - Compile Server
echo r - Runserver
echo s - edit settins
echo ------------------------------------------------------
set /p select= Selection:
if %select%==c goto compile
if %select%==r goto run
if %select%==s goto settings
if %select%==C goto compile
if %select%==R goto run
if %select$==S goto settings
cls
pause

:compile
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JRE1.6.0_02\BIN” (goto compile4)

:compile4
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JRE 1.6.0_02
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

:run
cls
title Runserver
java -Xmx800M server
cls
pause

:settings
cls
echo Enter one of the following to change background colour…
echo —
echo B0 - Black
echo B1 - Blue
echo B2 = Green
echo B3 Cyan
echo B4 = Red
echo B5 = Purple
echo B6 = Yellow
echo B7 = White

echo Enter one of the following to change text colour…
echo —
echo T0 = Black
echo T1 = Blue
echo T2 = Green
echo T3 = Cyan
echo T4 = Red
echo T5 = Purple
echo T6 = Yellow
echo T7 = White

set /p s= selection:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main[/code]

Read full topic
